formHeader.header: Become a part of our crew
formHeader.subHeaderTop: Helping others is an honor and incredibly cool. Thanks for wanting to do this
formHeader.subHeaderBottom: Please fill out the form below and we will review your request as soon as possible!

name.nameInputLabel: Will be shown on your card

email.emailInputLabel: We will send an invitation to it

photoUrl.photoUrlInputLabel: Better one where you are in the center

about.aboutInputLabel: Two or three paragraphs are desirable: where did you work, what interests you in the professional field, what methods do you follow in mentoring

description.descriptionTxt1: It's better to divide the text into tiles
description.descriptionTxt2-2: Could help Senior Developers and Team Leaders
description.descriptionTxt5: choose the optimal strategy for startup development

experience.experienceInputLabel: How many years have you been in the profession?

price.priceSubHeader: Cost per hour of your consultation

specialization.specializationSubHeader: Select no more than 5 tags which you are strong in

competencies.competenciesSubHeader: List the skills you would like to consult on, separated by commas
competencies.competenciesInputLabel: For example: JavaScript, React, Leadership, Code-review

calendar.calendarSubHeader: Provide a link to your calendar (e.g. Calendly.com). Then mentees will be able to make an appointment with you

policy.policySubHeader1-1: By clicking the button, you consent to the processing of personal data and agree with
